mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gds_goods_price (gid, store_id, sku, price_line_id, vip_price, retail_price, wholesale_price, start_time, end_time, price_type) VALUES (#{gid}, #{storeId}, #{sku}, #{priceLineId}, #{VIPPrice}, #{retailPrice}, #{wholesalePrice}, #{startTime}, #{endTime},#{priceType})
mapper.update:
UPDATE gds_goods_price
vip_price = #{VIPPrice},
retail_price = #{retailPrice},
wholesale_price = #{wholesalePrice},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
price_type = #{priceType},
WHERE price_line_id = #{priceLineId}
mapper.select:
SELECT p.gpid id, p.sku, p.vip_price, p.retail_price, p.wholesale_price, p.start_time, p.end_time, p.price_line_id, g.sku_name skuName, g.goods_specification goodsSpecification FROM gds_goods_price p LEFT JOIN gds_goods g ON p.gid = g.gid WHERE p.store_id = #{storeId} AND p.start_time < NOW() AND (p.end_time IS NULL OR p.end_time > NOW())
AND ( p.sku LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keywords}),'%') OR g.sku_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keywords}),'%') OR g.goods_specification LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keywords}),'%') )
ORDER BY p.gpid DESC
SELECT retail_price FROM gds_goods_price WHERE gid = #{goodsID} AND store_id = #{storeID} AND price_type = 'COMMON' AND start_time < NOW() AND (end_time IS NULL OR end_time > NOW())

SELECT ggp.* FROM gds_goods_price ggp LEFT JOIN cus_customer c on #{storeID} = ggp.store_id LEFT JOIN cus_rank cr on cr.cus_id = c.cus_id LEFT JOIN rank_classification rc on rc.rank_id = cr.rank_id WHERE ggp.gid = #{goodsID} AND ggp.store_id = #{storeID} AND ggp.start_time < NOW() AND (ggp.end_time IS NULL OR ggp.end_time > NOW()) and c.cus_id = #{cusId} and (ggp.price_type = rc.rank_code or ggp.price_type = 'common') ORDER BY ggp.vip_price LIMIT 1
